problem_text_cn: 如图所示,圆锥的母线长为10cm,其侧面展开图是圆心角为216°的扇形,则该圆锥的高为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the length of the generatrix of the cone is N_0, and the expanded figure of the lateral surface is a sector with a central angle of N_1, then the height of the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:扇形的弧长为:\frac{216π×10}{180}=12π,则圆锥的底面半径为:6,由勾股定理得,圆锥的高为:√{10^{2}-6^{2}}=8cm,故选:D．
